actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of extensions of the American Canal at El Paso, Tex., operation and maintenance.

summary.text: Authorizes the construction of extensions of the American Canal at El Paso, Texas, and provides for the operation and maintenance of the canal. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of extensions of the American Canal at El Paso, Tex., operation and maintenance.
